feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Azure DevTest Labs reference architecture for enterprises
entry.summary: Learn about the reference architecture that can help you deploy a solution based on Azure DevTest Labs in your enterprise.

entry.title: Exploratory data analysis with Azure Synapse serverless and a lakehouse
entry.summary: Synapse serverless is a fast way to do EDA over a data lake or lakehouse. Self-service analytics is easy for business analysts who understand some SQL.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for cost management and allocation in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for cost management and cost allocation in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for compute in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to support multitenancy for the compute components of your solution.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article introduces the approaches you can consider when planning a multitenant architecture.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for the deployment and configuration of multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider when deploying and configuring a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Azure Resource Manager considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Resource Manager that are useful when you work with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure Resource Manager in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Manage virtual machine compliance
entry.summary: Manage virtual machine compliance without impairing DevOps practices. Use Azure VM Image Builder and Azure Compute Gallery to minimize risk from system images.

entry.title: Many models ML with Azure Machine Learning
entry.summary: Many machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale with Azure Machine Learning.

entry.title: Many models machine learning with Spark
entry.summary: Many machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale in Azure with Spark.

entry.title: Connected factory signal pipeline
entry.summary: The connected factory signal pipeline architecture provides a common configuration interface to connect brownfield IoT devices through an OPC Unified Architecture (UA) gateway using custom APIs, and KEPServerEX IoT Gateway.

entry.title: Build CNCF projects by using Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: This article demonstrates how to conceptualize, architect, build, and deploy an application that uses projects from the CNCF after deployment of AKS.

entry.title: Multiparty computing with Azure services
entry.summary: Learn about Azure services can help you build a multiparty computing solution, which can include cloud-based and on-premises resources.

entry.title: Monitor the performance of a cloud application
entry.summary: Review a checklist about using monitoring for performance efficiency. Consider scalability, app and infrastructure performance, and resiliency.

entry.title: Auditing
entry.summary: Provides requirements and use cases for auditing software releases as it relates to monitoring, and diagnostics.

entry.title: Monitoring operations of cloud applications
entry.summary: Provides a monitoring checklist to monitor your workload for operational excellence.

entry.title: Health monitoring
entry.summary: Provides an overview of health modeling and monitoring as it relates to the Operational Excellence pillar.

entry.title: Issue tracking
entry.summary: Provides requirements and use cases for issue tracking as it relates to monitoring, and diagnostics.

entry.title: Tracing and debugging
entry.summary: Provides requirements and use cases for tracing operations and debugging software releases as it relates to monitoring, and diagnostics.

entry.title: Usage monitoring
entry.summary: Provides information and requirements for usage monitoring as it relates to monitoring and diagnostics.

entry.title: Alerting for operations
entry.summary: Explore alerting, which is the process of analyzing the monitoring and instrumentation data and generating a notification if a significant event is detected.

entry.title: Analyze monitoring data for cloud applications
entry.summary: Analyze monitoring data collected from various resources to get a view of the overall well-being of the system. This stage is important for root cause analysis for failures and determining quality of the system.

entry.title: Collect, aggregate, and store monitoring data for cloud applications
entry.summary: Collect monitoring data collected from various resources to get a view of the overall well-being of the system. This stage is important for root cause analysis for failures and determining quality of the system.

entry.title: Data sources for diagnostic data
entry.summary: Start by evaluating the data sources from which you need to capture monitoring data.

entry.title: Instrument an application
entry.summary: Provides information about instrumenting an application as it relates the health modeling and monitoring component of the Operational Excellence pillar.

entry.title: Monitoring workloads
entry.summary: Set up a pipe to collect, store, analyze, and visualize data for monitoring and diagnostics.

entry.title: Visualize data and raise alerts
entry.summary: Provides information about visualizing data and raising alerts as it relates to the health modeling and monitoring component of the Operational Excellence pillar.

entry.title: Hybrid file share with disaster recovery for remote and local branch workers
entry.summary: Learn how to provide high-availability desktop access to file shares in an environment with many on-premises locations, and a workforce that works on-premises and remotely.

entry.title: Improved-security access to multitenant web apps from an on-premises network
entry.summary: Set up improved-security private connectivity to a multitenant web app or function app from an on-premises network or from within an Azure virtual network.

entry.summary: See an enterprise monitoring solution that uses Azure Monitor to collect and manage data from cloud, on-premises, and hybrid resources.

entry.title: Scale AI and machine learning initiatives in regulated industries
entry.summary: Learn about scaling Azure AI and machine learning environments that must comply with extensive security policies.

entry.title: Long-term security log retention with Azure Data Explorer
entry.summary: Store security logs in Azure Data Explorer on a long-term basis. This solution minimizes costs and provides easy access when you need to query the data.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect Azure VMs by implementing two types of just-in-time access. Align with security principles like defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.title: Automated guided vehicles fleet control
entry.summary: This example architecture shows an end-to-end approach for an automotive original equipment manufacturer (OEM) and includes a reference architecture and several published supporting open-source libraries that can be reused.

entry.title: High throughput stream ingestion to Azure Synapse
entry.summary: This architecture uses Azure Stream Analytics to ingest data to an Azure Synapse dedicated SQL pool in high throughput scenarios.

entry.title: Azure AD join for Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: Learn how to configure Azure AD domain join for Azure Virtual Desktop host VMs without using Active Directory Domain Services domain controllers.

entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block networking. Understand what networking solution options exists and how to choose between them.

entry.summary: Learn how to run an Azure App Service application in multiple regions to achieve high availability, by following this reference architecture.

entry.summary: Use Event Grid to connect data sources and event handlers. Trigger a serverless function to run image analysis when a new photo enters a blob storage container.

entry.title: Gridwich saga orchestration
entry.summary: Understand the concepts and roles of sagas and saga participants in orchestrating Gridwich workflows.

entry.title: Solutions for the manufacturing industry
entry.summary: Architectures and ideas to use Azure services for building efficient, scalable, and reliable manufacturing solutions.

entry.summary: Learn about options for using the Asysco Automated Migration Technology (AMT) Framework to migrate Unisys mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.summary: This reference architecture shows proven practices for deploying a highly available SharePoint Server 2016 farm on Azure, using MinRole topology and SQL Server Always On availability groups.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement a custom token cache that derives from the Azure AD Authentication Library TokenCache class suitable for web apps.

entry.summary: This example shows how to establish the production environment for Business Central in partner private Azure environment.

entry.summary: Store and share database query results, session states, static contents, and more, by using a common cache-aside pattern.

entry.summary: Learn how Azure services and components can provide scale-out performance comparable to IBM z/OS mainframe CF and Parallel Sysplex capabilities.

entry.summary: Use security logs to view operations and raise alerts on anomalous activities in Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

entry.summary: Best practices for setting up networking as per Requirement 1 and 2 of PCI-DSS 3.2.1.

entry.summary: This guidance provides best practices for the Application Gateway v2 family of SKUs, based on the five pillars of architecture excellence.

entry.summary: Extract, transform, and load (ETL) big data clusters on demand by using Azure HDInsight, Hadoop MapReduce, and Apache Spark.

entry.summary: This solution delivers an optimized approach to backing up and restoring files and applications of VM-based user workloads hosted on Azure Stack Hub.

entry.summary: Simplify one-to-many real-time communication and updates by using SignalR Service and the serverless code of Azure Functions.

entry.title: Centralized app configuration and security
entry.summary: Use Azure App Configuration and Azure Key Vault to create a centralized and secured configuration service for apps.

entry.title: Use Azure HDInsight Hadoop Cluster on 1-TB dataset
entry.summary: Using the Team Data Science Process for an end-to-end scenario employing an HDInsight Hadoop cluster to build and deploy a model using a large (1 TB) publicly available dataset

entry.summary: Build partitioned tables for fast parallel bulk importing of data to a SQL Server database.

entry.summary: Explore data and generate features from data stored in Azure Blob storage using advanced analytics.

entry.summary: Learn how to use client certificate to prove the token request is genuine, to the Tailspin Surveys sample application.

entry.summary: Automate data flows with Apache NiFi on Azure. Use a scalable, highly available solution to move data into the cloud or storage and between cloud systems.

entry.summary: Use Helm charts when you deploy NiFi on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). Helm streamlines the process of installing and managing Kubernetes applications.

entry.summary: Monitor deployments of Apache NiFi on Azure by using MonitoFi. This tool sends alerts and displays health and performance information in dashboards.

entry.summary: Understand how to approach architecture when you're working in a startup.

entry.summary: See an elastic, flexible publish-subscribe model for data producers and consumers to create and consume validated curated content or data.

entry.summary: See how Qlik Replication is a valuable tool for migrating mainframe and midrange systems to the cloud, or for extending such systems with cloud applications.

entry.summary: Migrate an on-premises IBM AIX system and web application to a highly-available, secure RedHat Enterprise Linux solution in Azure.

entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Storage that are useful when working with multitenanted systems. It provides links to guidance and examples for how to use Azure Storage in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: Learn how healthcare and life science organizations can centralize data and use data science and machine learning to stay relevant to their customers.

entry.summary: Anomaly Detection API is an example built with Microsoft Azure Machine Learning. It detects anomalies in time series data with numerical values that are uniformly spaced in time.

entry.summary: Deploy machine learning models to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for high-scale production inference.

entry.summary: Use CluedIn to migrate your master data services solution to Azure, by using CluedIn and Azure Purview.

entry.summary: The SUSE SAP automation solution speeds deployment of SAP infrastructure on Azure. Use it to bolster productivity and facilitate innovation.

entry.summary: Use Azure Digital Twins to create models of smart places from IoT device data. View and control products, systems, environments, and experiences.

entry.summary: Guidance for security operation team (SecOps) is to rapidly detect, prioritize, and triage potential attacks.

entry.title: Overview of the security pillar
entry.summary: Learn about the key architectural considerations and principles for security and how they apply to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

entry.title: Transformer and collector ARM template
entry.summary: Describes how to implement a property transformer and collector in an Azure Resource Manager template.

entry.title: Overview of the cost optimization pillar
entry.summary: Provides an overview of the cost optimization pillar in the Azure Well-Architected Framework.

entry.title: Overview of a hybrid workload
entry.summary: Includes guidance and recommendations that apply to each of the five pillars in a hybrid and multi-cloud workload.

entry.title: Performance tuning - Multiple backend services
entry.summary: Use load testing to tune the performance of an application with multiple backend services. Increase resource units, run parallel queries, and optimize the query.

entry.title: Distributed business transaction performance tuning
entry.summary: Use load testing to tune the performance of a distributed business transaction. Tests include increasing the cache size, parallelism, and lock duration.

entry.title: Key and secret management in Azure
entry.summary: Examine key and secret management considerations in Azure. Protect keys by storing them in the managed key vault service.

entry.title: Monitor application health for reliability
entry.summary: Use application health monitoring to improve application reliability in Azure. Work with alerts, subscriptions, service limits, instrumentation, and more.

entry.title: Alerting for DevOps
entry.summary: Explore alerting, which is the process of analyzing the monitoring and instrumentation data and generating a notification if a significant event is detected.

entry.title: Performance efficiency checklist
entry.summary: Review checklist guidance for testing concerns with Azure performance efficiency. Maintain systems properly and fix defects before problems reach system users.

entry.title: Business Metrics
entry.summary: Learn to use business metrics to design resilient Azure applications. Review workload availability targets. Understand recovery and availability metrics.

entry.title: Secure app configuration and dependencies
entry.summary: Review application security for IaaS and PaaS. Make sure your configuration is secure. Also check the dependencies, frameworks, and libraries.

entry.title: Compare AWS and Azure networking options
entry.summary: Compare networking options between Azure and AWS. The comparisons cover cloud virtual networking, cross-premises connectivity, DNS management, and more.

entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.summary: Architectures and ideas to use Azure services for building efficient, scalable, and reliable retail solutions.

entry.title: Overview of the operational excellence pillar
entry.summary: Understand the operational excellence pillar, which covers the operations processes that keep an application running in production.

entry.title: Performance efficiency pillar overview
entry.summary: Explore an overview of the performance efficiency pillar in the Azure Well-Architected Framework. Learn about the importance of scalability.

entry.title: Azure security monitoring tools
entry.summary: Use security monitoring tools in Azure. Also get general security advice, such as detecting threats early and protecting resources against DDoS attacks.

entry.title: Data store decision tree
entry.summary: Select an Azure data store for your application. View a graphical representation of choosing your data store.

entry.title: Zero-trust landing zone in Azure
entry.summary: Security controls on a prepared infrastructure into which a workload can get deployed.

entry.title: Security alerts in Azure
entry.summary: Use security logs to view operations and raise alerts on anomalous activities in Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

entry.summary: Remediate the common risks identified by Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

entry.summary: Use Microsoft Defender for Cloud to monitor the security posture of machines, networks, storage and data services, and applications to discover potential security issues.

entry.summary: Implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for Oracle Database workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.summary: Implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for SQL Server workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.title: Hybrid architecture design
entry.summary: Get an introductory overview of hybrid cloud technologies and how you can connect an on-premises environment to Azure in a way that works best for your organization.

entry.summary: Improve operations by using Azure Databricks, Delta Lake, and MLflow for data science and machine learning. Develop, train, and deploy machine learning models.

entry.title: Orchestrate MLOps on Azure Databricks using Databricks Notebook
entry.summary: This scenario describes an approach to machine learning operations (MLOps) that involves running model training and batch scoring on Azure Databricks using Databricks Notebook as an orchestrator.

entry.summary: This guidance provides best practices for Azure Firewall, based on the Well-Architected Framework's five pillars of architecture excellence.

entry.summary: Use Azure services to re-engineer mainframe batch applications. This architecture change can reduce costs and improve scalability.

entry.summary: Learn how the activity of one tenant can impact the performance of other tenants in a multitenant system.

entry.summary: An overview of Azure IoT architectures. Learn basic concepts around getting started with Azure IoT, how to get started building an IoT solution, or understand how to optimize an IoT solution for production.

entry.summary: See how to refactor general mainframe applications to run more cost-effectively and efficiently on Azure.

entry.summary: Review application security for IaaS and PaaS. Make sure your configuration is secure. Also check the dependencies, frameworks, and libraries.

entry.summary: Strategies using management groups to manage resources across multiple subscriptions consistently and efficiently.

entry.summary: Best practices for network security in Azure, including network segmentation, network management, containment strategy, and internet edge strategy.

entry.summary: Examine key and secret management considerations in Azure. Protect keys by storing them in the managed key vault service.

entry.summary: Use benchmarking to assess your current security state with respect to other organizations.

entry.summary: Guidance for security operation team (SecOps) is to rapidly detect, prioritize, and triage potential attacks.

entry.summary: Security logging and monitoring are activities related to enabling, acquiring, and storing audit logs for Azure services.

entry.summary: Learn about how a multitenant application can authenticate users from Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and the OpenID Connect (OIDC) protocol.

entry.summary: Learn about two general approaches to authorization using APIs provided by ASP.NET Core: role-based authorization and resource-based authorization.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement a sign-up process in a multitenant application, which allows a customer to sign up their organization for your application.

entry.summary: Learn how to implement a custom token cache that derives from the Azure AD Authentication Library TokenCache class suitable for web apps.

entry.summary: Learn how to secure a backend web API for multitenant applications by using the Tailspin Surveys app, which has a backend API to manage operations on surveys.

entry.summary: Build scalability solutions for common stressors by learning about performance antipatterns. These are common practices that are likely to cause scalability problems when an application is under pressure.

entry.summary: Review the authentication considerations when you're using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) for a workload.

entry.summary: An overview of Microsoft's Azure mainframe and midrange architectural concepts and guidance offerings.

entry.summary: Learn about best practices for securing access to the internet, Azure platform as a service (PaaS) services, and on-premises networks.

entry.summary: Examine security considerations for Azure control plane. A control plane refers to the management of resources in your subscription.

entry.summary: Security strategy for automated deployment pipelines.

entry.summary: Secure your applications and services in Azure. Applications and the data associated with them act as the primary store of business value on a cloud platform.

entry.summary: Protect data in transit and at rest through encryption in Azure. Learn about Azure encryption features and standard encryption algorithms.

entry.summary: Examine traffic flow security in Azure. Learn about best practices for protecting a workload from data exfiltration.

entry.summary: Learn to define clear lines of responsibility and establish separation of duties as part of Azure identity and access management.

entry.summary: Learn how to extend a network from on premises or from Azure Stack into an Azure virtual network, using a site-to-site virtual private network (VPN).

entry.summary: Use threat modeling to identify threats, attacks, vulnerabilities, and countermeasures that can affect an application.

entry.summary: Governance for CI/CD pipelines to make sure right access and work is executed.

entry.summary: Use network-level segmentation to secure virtual networks. Understand Azure features for segmentation. Review three different segmentation patterns.

entry.summary: Migrate Unisys Dorado mainframe systems with Astadia and Micro Focus products. Move to Azure without rewriting code, switching data models, or updating screens.

entry.summary: Understand the benefits, challenges, and best practices of the Big Compute architecture style on Azure.

entry.summary: Learn how to deploy a Kubernetes cluster solution for high availability using Azure and Azure Stack Hub.
